attributes.action: Members of the Armed Armed Forces should not have to pay tax on their wages.
attributes.additional_details:
If Parliament can debate whether the NHS should not have to pay Tax during the Covid pandemic surely it’s worth discussing the same for all
of the British Armed forces too.
attributes.background:
Members of the Armed Armed Forces should not have to pay tax on their wages / back pay / bonuses. 

Car Tax and Insurance on hold whilst deployed and this will not affect their claims.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want armed forces personnel to be exempt from all taxes or income tax.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
